price: 29. Ee iskaga jeeso kan ka tegay Xuskayga (Qur’aanka) oo aan doonayn waxaan aheyn nolosha adduunka.
arabic: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَلَمۡ يُرِدۡ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-aʿriḍ ʿan man tawallā ʿan dhik'rinā walam yurid illā al-ḥayata al-dun'yā
